settings.heading: The Coast Kids
settings.body: Honor The Gift® Summer 2022 delivery continues the story of Russell Westbrook’s homage to Los Angeles. The Pacific Ocean acts as the lead inspiration defining this summer collection. A blue color palette and carefree California influence, breezes through this stripped back simple, yet refined range of raw edged knits, graphic tees and a cut and sew linen summer kit. Neighborhoods that surround the waters are reminiscent of driving down the coast.
